actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for an income tax credit for in-State contributions to congressional candidates.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for contributions to candidates for congressional offices for the State of which the taxpayer is a resident. Limits such contribution to $100 ($200 in the case of a joint return). Disallows such credit for an estate or trust.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for an income tax credit for in-State contributions to congressional candidates.
